name: Tripeaks Solitaire (itch) (Cassiopeiae)
description:
• Arcade Tripeak Solitaire with 300 levels

• Classic Tripeak 

• Daily mode with ranking – gold, silver and bronze

• Simple tap-to-play or drag-and-drop card movement

• Unlimited free undo

• Unlimited free hints

• All Winning deals

• Auto complete to solve game

• Choose your card style

• Winning classic animations

• Offline play

• Windowed Mode

• Unlock new card back, card face and background every 5 levels.
